statements: UPDATE patient_records SET health_history = 'Diagnosed with flu' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE patient_records SET treatment_plan = 'Prescribed antibiotics' WHERE patient_id = 2;
UPDATE patient_records SET treatment_plan = 'Physical therapy, medication' WHERE patient_id = 101, patient_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE patient_records SET patient_name = 'Jane Smith', health_history = 'No chronic illnesses' WHERE patient_id = 102;
UPDATE patients SET birth_date = '1990-05-15', height = 175.5 WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE treatment_plans SET treatment_details = 'Regular checkups', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE plan_id = '543e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
UPDATE patients SET height = 175.5, weight = 68.3 WHERE patient_id = '654321-abcd-1234-efgh';
UPDATE treatment_plans SET treatment_details = 'Physical therapy, 3 times a week', start_date = '2023-01-15', end_date = '2023-03-15' WHERE plan_id = '987654-wxyz-5678-ijkl';
UPDATE Patients SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE MedicalHistory SET diagnosis = 'Hypertension', treatment_plan = 'Medication and diet adjustments' WHERE patient_id = 2;
UPDATE Patients SET age = 40 WHERE patient_id = 12345;
UPDATE Appointments SET reason = 'Annual checkup' WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
UPDATE patients SET patient_name = 'John Doe', gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE treatments SET treatment_description = 'Regular checkup', treatment_date = '2021-08-20' WHERE treatment_id = 3;
UPDATE patients SET date_of_birth = '1990-05-15', gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE treatments SET treatment_description = 'Physical Therapy', treatment_date = '2022-03-10' WHERE patient_id = 102 AND doctor_id = 201;
UPDATE patients SET address='123 Maple Street' WHERE patient_id=1;
UPDATE health_records SET treatment_plan='Physical Therapy' WHERE record_id=5;
UPDATE patients SET address = '123 Main St, City' WHERE patient_id = 1001;
UPDATE health_records SET treatment_plan = 'Physical therapy twice a week' WHERE record_id = 2005;
